attributes.action: Allow wedding ceremonies to take place outdoors in England & Wales
attributes.additional_details: the is a 2 year back log for wedding ceremonies and reception due to Covid-19. By allowing outdoor ceremonies. Many more weddings and receptions can take place in covid secure outdoor places
attributes.background: For England and Wales to have the same rules on outdoor weddings as Scotland. Negating the need for a fixed structure for ceremonies. Allowing for faster recovery after Coronavirus

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319121
